channel.title: Gaia - By James Lucien [WIP, Experimental]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/james-lucien-official/gaia-demo
Got a spicy demo here, which i'd consider to be pretty experimental at a 7/8 time signature. Yes, it was difficult to compose.
Currently having trouble with some of it but I have an idea of how it could flow so I wanted to get some feedback on it. Aside from layering (I haven't layered it yet, this is about the notes themselves).
